hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Pot 1

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Compass Room Pot 1

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Biggoron Sword#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Nayru's Love# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Pot 3

ToT (Right).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
